definition.name: Publish action versions
definition.description: Move the major version tag to point to a specified ref

inputs.name: source-tag
inputs.description: Tag name that the major tag will point to. Examples: v1.2.3, 1.2.3

inputs.name: slack-webhook
inputs.description: Slack Webhook URL to post a message

inputs.name: token
inputs.description: Token to get an authenticated Octokit

outputs.name: major-tag
outputs.description: The major version tag that has been updated (created). Examples: v1, 1

evidence.reasoning: The action is primarily focused on publishing action versions, while it also involves authentication for accessing the GitHub API and can send notifications to Slack.
